short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minify JS, CSS, HTML, and JSON files with CodeTrim

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CodeTrim: Your One-Stop Shop for Code minification

Tired of bulky code slowing down your website? CodeTrim is here to help! This handy Chrome extension allows you to easily minify your JavaScript, CSS, HTML, and JSON files, making them smaller and faster to load. Powered by WASM.

Here's how it works:

Choose your file type: Select the type of code you want to minify from the available options (JS, CSS, HTML, or JSON).

Paste your code: Copy and paste your code into the designated text area.

Click "Minify":  CodeTrim will minimize your code in the blink of an eye.

Copy the minified code: Use the provided output area to easily copy the optimized code and paste the it into your website or application for improved performance.

Powered by WASM: CodeTrim utilizes a powerful WebAssembly (WASM) module, compiled from Golang, to perform the minification process efficiently. This ensures fast and reliable results, regardless of your code's complexity.

Benefits of using CodeTrim:

- Reduced file size: Smaller code leads to faster loading times for your web pages.

- Improved website performance: Optimized code contributes to a smoother user experience.

- Easy to use: Simple interface makes minification accessible to everyone, regardless of technical expertise.

- Supports multiple file types: Minify various code formats (JavaScript, CSS, HTML, and JSON).
